about_the_game:
In the second part of Sexy Apocalypse Girls, the protagonist is forced to go on a quest to find the missing Mandy. But Liam's not alone now. Along the way, he is joined by a new girlfriend he knows almost nothing about. Where will another partnership lead? After all, it's still a world full of danger, hunger and cruelty.

Even more new locations, characters, and hot tension in a new adventure!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images of sex, scenes of violence and strong language.

name: Sexy Apocalypse Girls. Part II

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 or newer

short_description: Sexy Apocalypse Girls. Part 2 is a sequel of the exciting hot story in the setting of zombies and a dying world.
